name: Cheddar
title: Members-Only Dating with Dynamic Pricing

background.headline: The Dating Quality Challenge
background.summary: Traditional dating apps rely on opaque algorithms and flood users with low-quality profiles, bots, and data-mining schemes. Many serious daters give up after swiping through hundreds of inactive or unserious accounts.
background.insight: Cheddar flips the model: use market dynamics to maintain a balanced pool of verified users who genuinely want to connect. Pricing throttles new sign-ups to prevent overcrowding and time-wasting.

structuralChallenges: Algorithmic matching hides true availability and biases engagement metrics
Unverified profiles and bots undermine trust and safety
Oversupply on one side of the market leads to poor match rates
Data-selling business models erode user privacy
High churn as users abandon apps after low-quality experiences
Complex feature sets inflate development and hosting costs

marketOpportunity.insight: Daters crave authenticity, transparency, and safety. By prioritizing verification and capacity balance, Cheddar delivers a superior experience with lower operational costs.
dataPoints: ID and selfie verification reduces catfishing by over 70%
Dynamic pricing models are proven in ride-share and ticketing industries
Dating-app churn rates exceed 50% monthly on average
Users willing to pay for safety and quality: 60% open to subscription fees
Algorithm fatigue: 45% of users distrust recommendation engines

solution.headline: Cheddar: Market-Driven Membership
solution.description: Cheddar uses dynamic membership pricing and strict verification to keep its community serious and balanced. No hidden algorithms—just a transparent pool of verified singles who value real connections.

coreFeatures.title: Dynamic Capacity Management
coreFeatures.text: Membership fees adjust based on real-time demand to maintain gender and engagement balance.

coreFeatures.title: ID & Liveness Verification
coreFeatures.text: Government ID check plus in-app camera-only liveness capture ensures every profile is authentic.

coreFeatures.title: Transparent Discovery Tools
coreFeatures.text: Age, location, and preference filters; proximity sorting; recent activity indicators—all user-driven.

coreFeatures.title: Referral-Driven Growth
coreFeatures.text: Members earn credits by referring friends, fueling sustainable community expansion.

coreFeatures.title: Results-Oriented Design
coreFeatures.text: No swipes, no hidden ranking—members see the full pool and connect by choice, not algorithm.

items.traditional: Algorithmic recommendations based on opaque scoring
items.cheddar: Full pool visibility with user-controlled filters

items.traditional: Optional or no verification; heavy bot presence
items.cheddar: Mandatory ID + selfie liveness for all members

items.traditional: Unlimited signups leading to overcrowded pools
items.cheddar: Dynamic pricing throttles sign-ups to maintain balance
No data selling; minimal collection; clear retention policies

items.traditional: Free with premium tiers or ad-funded

vision.title: Empowering Intentional Daters

principles.title: Transparency Over Tactics
principles.description: Open pricing and discovery tools build trust and user control.

principles.title: Verification Over Guesswork
principles.description: Rigorous identity checks eliminate bots and fake profiles.

principles.title: Sustainability Over Scale
principles.description: Balanced capacity ensures meaningful interactions, not endless swiping.

principles.title: Privacy Over Profit
principles.description: No data-selling; user data is protected and purged on schedule.

vision.summary: Cheddar is reshaping online dating by focusing on market dynamics, safety, and user empowerment rather than engagement algorithms.

expectedImpact: 70% reduction in bots and fake profiles after verification
50%+ lower churn due to balanced user pools
High willingness to pay: 60% positive trial conversion
Operational costs cut by 50% versus algorithmic platforms

scenarios.description: Busy individuals who want a verified pool and transparent tools to quickly find compatible partners.
Those who refuse to trade personal data for matching and demand strict retention policies.
Users tired of endless swiping and algorithm fatigue, seeking a streamlined experience.
Early adopters who refer friends and help maintain a high-quality, engaged community.

items.description: Dynamic pricing ensures neither side is overwhelmed, improving match rates.
Mandatory verification builds trust and safety across the community.
Transparent tools let members drive their own discovery.
No data selling and strict retention keep personal information safe.

points.title: Market-Based Pricing
points.description: Real-time fee adjustments maintain optimal engagement ratios.

points.title: Verification Focus
points.description: All members pass ID and liveness checks—industry best practice.

points.title: Lean Architecture
points.description: No AI/ML servers means lower hosting costs and faster development cycles.

points.title: Referral Economics
points.description: Members drive growth through referrals, reducing CAC.

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Submit basic profile and choose your membership option.

steps.title: Verify
steps.description: Complete ID + camera-only liveness capture for instant approval.

steps.title: Join Pool
steps.description: Gain access to the active member roster; engage via transparent discovery.

steps.title: Connect & Exit
steps.description: Message directly, form connections, and exit with referral credits for friends.

whyNow: Users demand authenticity amid algorithm fatigue
Verification tech is mature and cost-effective
Privacy regulations favor minimal data collection
conclusion: Cheddar redefines online dating by blending market-driven membership, rigorous verification, and transparent discovery. It offers a high-quality, privacy-first platform for intentional connections.
